text:
Rail Safety National Law (Tasmania)

The Rail Safety National Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the schedule to the Rail Safety National Law (South Australia) Act 2012 of South Australia is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Rail Safety National Law (Tasmania) Act 2012 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Rail Safety National Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Rail Safety National Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 20 January 2013.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Rail Safety National Law is set out in the Schedule to the Rail Safety National Law (South Australia) Act 2012 of South Australia (click on INFORMATION for a link to South Australian legislation). See the Rail Safety National Law (Tasmania) Act 2012 for modifications to the Rail Safety National Law as it applies in Tasmania.
